breeds.title: Persian
breeds.description: The Persian cat is a long-haired breed of cat characterized by its round face and short muzzle. It is also known as the 'Persian Longhair' in the English-speaking countries.

breeds.title: Siamese
breeds.description: The Siamese cat is a breed of domestic cat that originated in Thailand. It is characterized by its blue eyes and distinctive color-point coat.

breeds.title: Bengal
breeds.description: The Bengal cat is a breed of domestic cat with distinctive markings and a playful, energetic personality. It was developed by breeding an Asian leopard cat with a domestic cat.

breeds.title: Sphynx
breeds.description: The Sphynx cat is a breed of cat known for its lack of fur and wrinkled skin. It is an affectionate and energetic breed that loves to cuddle.

breeds.title: Maine Coon
breeds.description: The Maine Coon cat is a large, long-haired breed of cat known for its friendly and gentle personality. It is one of the oldest natural breeds in North America.

breeds.title: Scottish Fold
breeds.description: The Scottish Fold cat is a breed of cat known for its distinctive ears that fold forward and down. It is a calm and friendly breed that loves attention.
breeds.pros: Friendly, calm, good with other pets
breeds.cons: Can have health problems related to ear shape

breeds.title: Russian Blue
breeds.description: The Russian Blue cat is a breed of cat known for its silvery-blue coat and bright green eyes. It is a quiet and intelligent breed that is loyal to its owners.

breeds.title: Ragdoll
breeds.description: The Ragdoll cat is a large, long-haired breed of cat known for its docile and affectionate personality. It is a popular breed for families with children.

breeds.title: Birman
breeds.description: The Birman is a long-haired breed of domestic cat known for its striking blue eyes and white paws. It is a gentle and affectionate breed that enjoys human companionship.
breeds.pros: Affectionate, calm, good with children and other pets

breeds.title: British Shorthair
breeds.description: The British Shorthair is a breed of domestic cat with a muscular build and short, plush coat. It is a calm and affectionate breed that enjoys lounging around the house.

breeds.title: Devon Rex
breeds.description: The Devon Rex is a breed of cat known for its curly coat and large ears. It is an active and playful breed that loves to climb and explore.
breeds.pros: Playful, affectionate, good with other pets
breeds.cons: May be prone to health problems

interactive_games.title: Paper Ball
interactive_games.description: Crumple up a piece of paper and toss it to your cat. Watch them bat it around and pounce on it!

interactive_games.title: Cardboard Box Maze
interactive_games.description: Create a maze out of cardboard boxes and let your cat explore and play hide-and-seek!

interactive_games.title: Treat Puzzle
interactive_games.description: Hide your cat's favorite treat inside a puzzle toy and watch them figure out how to get it out!

interactive_games.title: String Game
interactive_games.description: Wiggle a piece of string in front of your cat and watch them try to catch it!

interactive_games.title: Feather Wand
interactive_games.description: Wave a feather wand in front of your cat and watch them try to catch it!

interactive_games.title: Catnip Toy
interactive_games.description: Give your cat a toy filled with catnip and watch them roll around and play with it!

interactive_games.title: Ping Pong Ball
interactive_games.description: Bounce a ping pong ball in front of your cat and watch them try to catch it!

interactive_games.title: Tunnel
interactive_games.description: Get a tunnel toy for your cat to explore and play in!

interactive_games.title: Water Play
interactive_games.description: Put a few inches of water in a bathtub or sink and let your cat splash and play!

interactive_games.title: Chase Game
interactive_games.description: Run around the house or yard with your cat chasing after you!

quiz_questions.question: Are you a lone wolf or do you enjoy company?
Do you like going outside or are you a home person?
How do you feel about cat fluff all over your clothes?

quiz_answers.answer: I am definitely a lone wolf
I am the hear and soul of a company
I love going outside every day
Actually I am totally OK with that
